message: This is a rare opportunity to own a high-quality product that is worth $2000000 to you. I'm willing to let it go for the low price of $1000000. It's a steal! Don't miss out on this chance to make a smart investment.
I'm not going to fall for a classic sales pitch. I'll pass on this one. I'll wait for more information before making a decision.
